channel.title: kubernetes on Ladicle
channel.description: Recent content in kubernetes on Ladicle

item.title: Let's Customize Kubernetes to Develop an Automation Platform! - Cloud Native Days Tokyo 2019
Recap SIG API Machinery Deep Dive - Kubernetes meetup Tokyo #11
item.description: I recapped SIG API Machinery Deep Dive of KubeCon Europe 2018. After that we more deep dive into the CRD validation and versioning. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/recap-api-machinery-deep-dive Event: https://k8sjp.connpass.com/event/85336/ Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MTG5H4J2jHg

item.title: Manage Microservices with Istio - Japan Container Days v18.04
item.description: I’ve developed and operated Microservices over 3 years, and they are gradually larger and more complexity. Managing those microservices is difficult. Istio is a great product! Because it can solve many problems that I faced. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/istiotogong-nimaikurosabisunili-tixiang-kae Event: https://containerdays.jp

item.title: Mastodon on Kubernetes - Kubernetes meetup Tokyo #4
item.description: I start to operate Mastdon on my home Kubernetes cluster. Mastdon is a twitter like social networking service. I talked about how to deploy it on the cluster, and how to use Services, PersistentVolumes, CronJobs, and Deployments. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/mastodon-on-kubernetes Event: https://k8sjp.connpass.com/event/53737/ Video: https://youtu.be/GlbPk0mHgcs?t=2h13m52s Code: https://github.com/Ladicle/mastodon-chart

item.title: Monitoring k8s with Prometheus - Prometheus Tokyo Meetup #1
k8s helm & helmc - Kubernetes meetup Tokyo #2
item.description: I talked about helm and helmc. Helm is a package manager for Kubernetes, and Helm classic is a previous version of it. Helm will be implemented a lot of useful functions in the future, but it isn’t better than helmc for now. That’s why it’s better to manage manifests with helmc and follow the trend of helm. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/kubernetes-helm-and-helmc Event: https://k8sjp.connpass.com/event/33508/
